content: I’ve been getting a little frustrated with Medium lately because all I see on my feed is life lessons and deep, meaningful insights but are great but sometimes tiring. I wished yesterday that there was more humour to read. This is exactly what I wanted. The last line made me LOL. Thanks! And I get you. Maybe your soul mate is out there coming off as just as creepy. Look out for her. 😉 (Was that creepy?)
